### 전통 지표 기준 강대국


```{r oecd-stats }
library(tidyverse)
library(countrycode)
library(reactable)
library(htmltools)

oecd_full_df <- read_rds(glue::glue("{here::here()}/data/oecd_full_df.rds"))

oecd_df <- oecd_full_df %>% 
  select(country, flags, -ends_with("rank"), everything()) %>% 
  mutate(iso2c = countrycode(iso3c, origin = "iso3c", destination = "iso2c") %>% str_to_lower(.)) %>% 
  mutate(gdp = round(gdp/10^9, 0),
         population = round(population / 10^6, 0))

oecd_df %>% 
  select("country", "flags", "gdp", "area", "population", "gdp_per_capita") %>% 
  arrange(desc(gdp)) %>% 
    reactable(
    style = list(fontSize = '17px'),
    filterable = FALSE,
    searchable = FALSE,
    defaultPageSize = 10,
    highlight = TRUE,
    columns = list(
        country = colDef(name = "국가",
          width = 200,
          html = TRUE,
          cell = JS("function(cell) {
            return '<a href=\"https://wikipedia.org/wiki/' + cell.value + '\">' + cell.value + '</a>'
          }")
        ),
        flags = colDef(name = "국기",
          width = 70
        ),
        gdp = colDef(name = "GDP",
          width = 120,
          format = colFormat(separators = TRUE)
        ),
        area = colDef(name = "면적",
          format = colFormat(separators = TRUE)
        ),
        gdp_per_capita = colDef(name = "국민소득",
          format = colFormat(separators = TRUE)
        )
    ),
  fullWidth = TRUE
  )
```

:::

### 확장 지표 기준 선진국


```{r oecd-esg-extended}

oecd_df %>% 
  select("country", "flags", "income_inequality", "hdi", "fsi", "cpi", "ief", "gpi", "wpfi", "di") %>% 
  arrange(income_inequality) %>% 
    reactable(
    style = list(fontSize = '17px'),
    filterable = FALSE,
    searchable = FALSE,
    defaultPageSize = 10,
    highlight = TRUE,
    columns = list(
        country = colDef(name = "국가",
          width = 200,
          html = TRUE,
          cell = JS("function(cell) {
            return '<a href=\"https://wikipedia.org/wiki/' + cell.value + '\">' + cell.value + '</a>'
          }")
        ),
        income_inequality = colDef(name="소득불평등",
          width = 150
        ),
        hdi = colDef(
          width = 70
        ),
        fsi = colDef(
          width = 70
        ),
        cpi = colDef(
          width = 70
        ),  
        ief = colDef(
          width = 70
        ),
        gpi = colDef(
          width = 70
        ),
        wpfi = colDef(
          width = 70
        )        
    ),
  fullWidth = FALSE
  )
```
